name: Oh No She Didn't! by SATX Games #ONSD
name_original: Oh No She Didn't! by SATX Games #ONSD
description:
Oh No She Didn't!  

#ONSD

There is only one last pair of designer heels in the mall, and everyone is determined to prevent you from purchasing them.  

Defeat all enemies and overcome all obstacles to unlock your shoes.

This game works with an Xbox or PC gaming controller.  

How to Play:

Purse Swing = X;   Kick = B;   Jump = A;   Block = Y;   Charge attack = R1; 

Powerup Moves:

[Blue light]  Crouch Kick = Down + Hold-B

[Blue light]  Throw Fireball = X

[Yellow light]  Twirl Attack = R2

Bonus Powerup:

When she says, "Oh No She Didn't!" the Twirl attack (R2) activates for 5 seconds.
